TopicTitle: KSP should have an option to change Versions via Steam

Articles.Content: Hello, I have been seeing posts about how to switch to older versions. I think it would be a good idea, as it is easy to be able to set betas, in fact, KSP already has this for version 1.1.3 and 1.0.5.(For me atleast). I was thinking if all the versions could be accessible, for reasons such as to play mod(Or modpacks) that no longer have support, or for people to experience the old KSP. Also, it would be cool to see the magic boulder again!
